entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
